Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Sturdy 7 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
1 Weak Armor 4 Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
18 Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
36 Rock Head 6 Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
54 Bulletproof 8 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
72 Sand Force 7 Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
90 Sand Stream 9 The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.
100 Solid Rock 7 Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 01 Battle Armor 2 Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Disc 04 Insomnia 5 The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
Disc 12 Sturdy 7 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
Disc 15 Lightning Rod 7 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Electric-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
Disc 17 Mimicry 3 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Disc 19 Sand Force 7 Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
Disc 20 Rock Head 6 Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
Disc 28 Solid Rock 7 Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
Disc 40 Sand Stream 9 The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.
Disc 48 Oblivious 3 The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or taunted.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Analytic 6 Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
Bulletproof 8 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
Calcifate 8 Normal-type moves become Rock-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Heatproof 6 The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Magic Guard 12 The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
Mold Breaker 9 Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
No Guard 8 The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.
Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
Punk Rock 6 Boosts the power of sound- based moves and halves the damage taken from them.
Purifying Salt 7 The Pokémon's salt protects it from statuses and halves damage from Ghost-type moves.
Rocky Payload 5 Boosts the power of Rock-type moves.
Sand Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a sandstorm.
Simple 8 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Soundproof 7 Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Stalwart 2 Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.
Terralate 8 Normal-type moves become Ground-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Weak Armor 4 Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
Galvanize 8 Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
High-Pressured 4 The Pokémon generates a heat wave when it's hit by an attack.
Iron Barbs 6 Inflicts damage on the attacker upon contact with iron barbs.
Mirror Armor 9 Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.
Rough Skin 6 This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
